Row.Text: The Grand Embassy

Alas, our efforts to seek a secure alliance against our enemies has failed. Yet our diplomatic mission throughout the continent, which has become known as 'the Grand Embassy,' has not been for nothing, for we have been afforded a wealth of experience with which to make our government powerful and modern.[NEWLINE]
We shall make use of our knowledge of Shipbuilding
We shall make use of our knowledge of Carpentry.
We shall make use of our knowledge of Dentistry.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 10% boost in the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of Naval Units[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 5% boost in the [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production of Buildings[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a permanent 5% boost in [ICON_FOOD] Growth rate in all Cities[ENDCOLOR]
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Shipbuilding to the government of Russia.
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Carpentry to the government of Russia.
We have implemented our newly acquired knowledge of Dentistry to the government of Russia.
Peter I of Russia has returned from a diplomatic mission around the world.
The Bulavin Rebellion

The Don Cossacks of the far east, led by their Ataman Kondraty Bulavin, have risen up against us in opposition to our efforts to modernise Russia. They pillage and rape the countryside, and march upon our cities and farmlands! We must put an end to this immediately, before they sow further discontent over our reforms.[NEWLINE]
We must crush this rebellion swiftly!
Let us concede to the demands of this Bulavin.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]2 enemy Cossacks appears within your borders[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We shall respond with force against the uprising of the Don Cossacks!
We have conceded to the demands of the Don Cossack leader, Bulavin.
The Don Cossacks have risen up in Russia against the modernisation reforms of Peter I.
